div.h2:
3 Steps to determine if Leadership Academy
is right for you and your family

div.p: Want to know if Leadership Academy of Utah is the right fit for your family? Go ahead and take our Right Fit Quiz to determine whether or not your student would succeed and thrive in our program!

After you’ve taken our Right Fit Quiz, one of our advisors will contact you to review your results. During this conversation, you will also get a better sense for who we are, including our values, our program, and what Leadership Academy is like. Feel free to ask any questions you have during this call.

div.h3: Create an Education Plan For Your Child’s Success
div.p: If Leadership Academy is a right fit for your family, our advisor will set up an appointment for you with one of our School Academic Counselors to create a customized education plan for your students. They’ll help you register for courses and get ready to succeed at Leadership Academy!
